elements.title: Etruscan women (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that frescoes, sarcophagi, urns, and trousseaux found in the tombs of Etruscan women (bust pictured) show the important roles they played in society?

elements.title: education (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that it is controversial whether indoctrination forms part of education?

elements.title: Give Me Your Hand (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Megan Abbott's 2018 novel Give Me Your Hand uses menstruation as a metaphor, which she compared to comments made by Donald Trump during the 2016 election?

elements.title: Sometime Samurai (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Towa Tei's "Sometime Samurai" remained unfinished for eight years until Australian singer Kylie Minogue re-recorded the song in 2004?

elements.title: Nancy Brown (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that readers of Detroit columnist Nancy Brown funded the reforestation of 560 acres of land in her honor during the Great Depression?

elements.title: Castle in the Sky (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that fans of Castle in the Sky twice broke the record for largest number of tweets posted per second?

elements.title: Henry Biard (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that pilot Henry Biard made his first flight before taking his first flying lesson?

elements.title: Parimal Garden (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Parimal Garden in Ahmedabad has scrap-metal monkeys?
